long_description: For times when you only want to carry the bare minimum, the Keen Hazel Wristlet keeps your phone, cash, credit cards and keys close at hand without the bulk of a backpack or purse. Internal organizer stows cash and credit cards; entire purse zips closed to keep phone and other contents contained. External flat pocket on back has a snap-tab closure. Use either the wrist strap or the removable shoulder strap for a hands-free carrying option. Keen Hazel Wristlet wallet exterior is made of durable nylon with a highly water-resistant, environmentally friendly coating.
short_description: For times when you only want to carry the bare minimum, the Keen Hazel Wristlet keeps your phone, cash, credit cards and keys close at hand without the bulk of a backpack or purse.
